title: Fine-grained tool streaming
description: Tool use now supports fine-grained [streaming](/docs/en/build-with-claude/streaming) for parameter values. This allows developers to stream tool use parameters without buffering / JSON validation, reducing the latency to begin receiving large parameters.

h2: How to use fine-grained tool streaming
Handling invalid JSON in tool responses

summary: Explains how fine-grained tool streaming enables real-time parameter streaming for API tool use without buffering, reducing latency and improving efficiency in large data transfers.
